Text: Change in Phone NumberGood evening This email is to inform each of you that my phone number will be changing effective October The Employbridge Dallas Business Service Center has purchased its own PBX and all of our phone numbers are changing The new main number is and my direct line is My fax number will be Once again this is effective next Monday October nd Until then you can reach me at my current number Thanks Stayton PettyJohn CFO Dallas Business Service Center Employbridge Please note that my phone number starting October nd will be The main number to the Dallas Business Service Center will be
